channel.title: Tutorial on Log in
channel.description:
[b]NOTICE: THIS IS A PI 317[/b] How could I create a tutorial, Such as the one on SoulSplit? I was only wondering, How to do the following..
A fading effect making the screen slowly go Black. How to make the player teleport place to place? p.X-abs p.Y-abs? or What? And a tutorial on timers..
I'm not trying to copy SoulSplit, I just thought it was a good idea.. And Id like to do that myself... Sincerely, Trade me

item.title: Tutorial on Log in
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

  1. There are frames you can send to black out the screen and minimap, refer to the Wiki for more information.
  2. By using the [tt]startTeleport(int, int, int, String);[/tt] method in PlayerAssistant
  3. Instead of timers, try using an Event system. (Most likely already implemented into your server)

Read full topic
